Entry.JapaneseText: 酒場のおじさんには悪いけど、 この船で一気にバルカへ行こう!!
Entry.EnglishText: I feel bad about ghosting the manager of the bar, but let's sail this ship straight to Balka.

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……それほどうまくは、 いかないようだ……
Entry.EnglishText: No, I doubt that we'd be able to make it that far.
Entry.Notes: text went off screen in game, so I fixed the line break. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 沖合いに停泊している船が 見えるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Do you not see the boats anchored right offshore?
Entry.Notes: text went off screen in game, so I fixed the line break. -dragon

Entry.EnglishText: Oh yeah, now that you mention it...

Entry.JapaneseText: 港だけでなく海上も封鎖されている。
Entry.EnglishText: Not only the harbor, but the entire sea is blockaded.
Entry.Notes: text went off screen in game, so I fixed the line break. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: この状態で船を出しても、 不審な動きをすれば、砲撃されかねない。
Entry.EnglishText: If we were to sail out under these circumstances, it's likely that any suspicious movement would be met with artillery.
Entry.Notes: too long. Goes off screen ( might be fine with new spacing)

Entry.JapaneseText: バレないように行く方法はないの？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think there's any way to sneak past them?
Entry.Notes: text goes off screen. fixed the line break. -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: 沖合いに出られたとしても すぐに連絡がいって追撃されるだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if we were to get out to sea, they would probably be given a signal to pursue us.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうかあ……じゃあダメだね……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... Guess we're outta luck then...
I hate to say this, but we'll just have to go back.
